price: 32. (Il m’a recommandé aussi) la bonté envers ma mère, et Il n’a pas fait de moi un être arrogant et misérable.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
